content.text: Read the next questionnaire carefully. Notice the use of the present perfect tense.  You will answer a similar questionnare in exercise F.

content.class: text-2xl border-4 my-2 border-sky-900 reounded-lg p-5 mx-10 rounded-lg

content.text: What had you done by the time you were 12 years old ?
content.name: PAI2

content.text: By the time I was 12 years old, I had already learned how to ride the bike, and I had just finished elementary school.
content.name: Yif5

content.class: flex justify-center bg-sky-900 mask mask-squircle p-2

content.text: What had you done by the time you finished secondary school?
content.name: wihi

content.text: By the time I finished secondary school, I had learned how to speak English and I had traveled by airplane.

content.text: Remember we use the past perfec for the actions that happened before.
